title: Can we fix toxic Akali now?
body: SHE GOT DUMPSTERED in my lane. i played the lane so damn well, but as soon as she got to level 6, and a hextech, the laning phase didn't even matter. I couldn't build against her. I couldn't rely on my tower because she heals more than it can do damage. She became so off tanky there was no point in fighting her. I couldn't build against her hybrid damage. My team and jungler was doing great, but as soon as this fuck got a hextech and her ult, it's like the fun competitive part of the game just shuts the fuck down.

The problem with {{champion:84}} is that there is no chance to mechanically outplay her. 
There are no skillshots to dodge, there are no timings to play around, as with vladimir q. 
There are no special circumstances she needs to hit to use multiple dashes, as with Diana ulti. 
There is no way to reveal her stealth, there is no way to stun her and wait out her q duration as the duration is longer than the cooldown.
She is one of the few absolutely binary champions in the game, where if she's stronger she's going to kill you and there is almost nothing you can do about it but if you're stronger you're gonna kill her and there is almost nothing you can do about it.

Except, you know, she doesn't actually get that strong unless she has a good matchup or if you fight her in the smoke.

I´ve beaten Akali top repetedly playing Kayle, jax and Irelia, despite them all being supposed to be bad matchups into akali, just because i always instantly ran away if she tried to smokebomb near me.

She won't get any kills unless you screw up too badly, or if the matchup favors her a lot.

Until this new tank meta...well...some tanks that is.

Just because it was always there doesn't mean it's actually healthy. The item literally just makes weaknesses of Akali and Katarina disappear when it comes to jumping in for a kill. It promotes unhealthy gameplay. The item is also a generalist and is overloaded. It doesn't give you a niche, it gives you more unnecessary burst damage to you kit and soft cc that isn't needed on the champions that build it since they're balanced around not having CC. And assassins shouldn't get so much sustain.

The only way the item is justified is with how much it costs. But even then it's really gold efficient and it shouldn't be an excuse to why it gives such a huge powerspike. In a sense it's similar to Duskblade. It should either be removed or heavily reworked into something like  a bruiser item when they eventually get to the AP itemization update.

They should add more niche items that can help them so they actually have a choice in builds instead of having a generalist that doesn't let you build anything else since it's too good to pass up on.
